labels.name: io.k8s.display-name
labels.value: Red Hat Universal Base Image 8 Minimal

labels.name: description
labels.value: MariaDB MaxScale is a database proxy that extends the high availability, scalability, and security of MariaDB Server

labels.name: io.k8s.description
labels.value: The Universal Base Image Minimal is a stripped down image that uses microdnf as a package manager. This base image is freely redistributable, but Red Hat only supports Red Hat technologies through subscriptions for Red Hat products. This image is maintained by Red Hat and updated regularly.
